scripts.package:layer: mkdir -p dist/nodejs/ && cp -rf node_modules dist/nodejs/ && cd dist/ && zip -rq layer.zip . && cd ..
scripts.package:src: cd src/ && zip -rq src.zip . && mv src.zip ../dist/ && cd ..
scripts.package: yarn package:clean && export SHARP_IGNORE_GLOBAL_LIBVIPS=1 npm_config_platform=linux npm_config_arch=x64 && yarn --prod && yarn package:src && yarn package:layer
